Headline: Delays Affecting O'Hare-bound Blue Line Trains
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running w/delays from congestion after an earlier mechanical problem on a train at Pulaski. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running with delays from congestion after an earlier mechanical problem on a train at Pulaski.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines. These may include:

  • #7 Harrison
  • #53 Pulaski

As a result of the delay, shuttle buses are still requested from Forest Park to UIC-Halsted to provide connecting service in both directions.

Crews are working to clear the congestion that's formed and restore normal travel times through the area.

Allow extra travel time.
